name: Novus AEterno: Re-launched (Canceled)
blurb: Expand your empire over a persistent universe; negotiate, trade, fight & deceive thousands of players on a seamless RTS map.

rewards.reward: Pioneer\r\n============================== \r\n+Kickstarter Early Adopter Medal awarded to you on the forums!                                              +Awesome Novus AEterno wallpaper and the exclusive kickstarter character avatar unlocked for the forums and ingame!

Colonial Peacekeeper
============================== 
Everything in the Pioneer Tier and;
+  Receive a full version of the game upon full release
+ Awesome high quality Novus AEterno digital concept art!

Imperial Chaplain 
==============================
Everything in the Colonial Peacekeeper Tier and;
+ Full 2-hour digital soundtrack, composed by Denny Schneidemesser.
+ Digital Story Bible, filled with great art work, the backgrounds and history of all the races in the Novus AEterno universe!
+ Reserve ingame username.

Infiltrator
==============================
 
Everything in the Imperial Chaplain Tier and;
+ Become a “Infiltrator”. Get access to the game 15-20 days after the kickstarter campaign has ended! 
+ Access to the Exclusive ‘Endgame’ Kickstarter backers fleet!
+ Kickstarter Edition starting planet! +20% starting population!
+ Novus AEterno Digital Strategy Guide with tips and tricks from the developers!
+ Design the lore behind a Theory for use ingame (part of the research system)
+ Get your name in the game credits for backing us!
+ 1 Extra Novus AEterno Infiltrator copy to give to a friend (2 keys in total!)
+ 2 months premium account and some ingame resources to get you going!

Imperial Engineer
==============================
Everything in the Infiltrator Tier and;
+ Design any 3 components - Their functionality, name and the lore behind them. (Weapons, engines, shields, bays, etc.)
+ 1 Extra Novus AEterno Infiltrator copy to give to a friend (3 keys in total!)
+ 4 months premium account and some ingame resources to get you going!
+ Novus AEterno limited edition Genesis command T-shirt

Fearless Leader (Digital)
==============================
 
Reserve your Alliance name!
+ 4 Copies of Novus Aeterno will Infiltrator access
+ 4 Exclusive ‘Endgame’ backers fleets!
+ 4 Exclusive 'Karcharias' backers fleets!
+ 4 Kickstarter Edition starting planet! +20% starting population!
+ Novus AEterno Digital Strategy Guides, for Diplomacy, Military, And Economy.
+ Full 2-hour digital soundtrack, composed by Denny Schneidemesser. 
+ Digital Story Bible, filled with great art work, the backgrounds and history of all the races in the Novus AEterno universe! 
+ Reserve ingame usernames (4 of them).
+ Get your (and your 3 friends) names in the game credits for backing us!
+ 4Early Adopter Medal awarded to you on the forums! 
+Awesome Novus AEterno wallpaper and the exclusive kickstarter character avatar unlocked for the forums and ingame!
+ 8 months premium account (can be divided up between the accounts)

Lore Master
==============================
Everything in the Imperial Engineer  Tier and;

+ Access to the Exclusive ‘Endgame’ Kickstarter backers fleet!
+ Access to the Exclusive ‘Karcharías’ Kickstarter backers fleet!
+ Hardcover Story bible with comprehensive information about the Novus AEterno Universe.
+ Novus AEterno limited edition Genesis command T-shirt
+ Help design an in game object (space junk, meteors / anomalies.)
+ Design an Artifact! You can name it, design it’s stats and the lore behind it). 
+ Special Kickstarter Prototype Component pack for ingame!
+ Starting pack 50 of Tier 1 ship components to get your fleet combat ready ASAP!
+ Starting pack of 5 random in game artifacts
+ Access to the developer forum area where you can discuss your ideas directly to the team.
+ 3 Extra Novus AEterno Infiltrator copies to give to friends (6 keys in total!)
+ 1 year premium account and some ingame resources to get you going!

Master Merchant ==============================
Everything in the Lore Master Tier and;

+ Help design an in game item with the art team. (ship skin, avatar, planet or space junk, etc.)
+ Design a ship with the art team for general in game use. 
+ Design how a sub-faction interacts with the universe, and you can name its faction leader.
+ 1 Extra Novus AEterno Infiltrator copy to give to a friend (7 keys in total!)
+ LIFETIME Novus AEterno premium account and some ingame resources to get you going!

Lord Commander ==============================
Everything in the Master Merchant  Tier and;

+ Come to PAX and spend a day with us! Paintballing, eating and other nice stuff. (You are responsible for your transportation and sleeping arrangements.)
+ We will add your name/avatar to the history of the human race as one of the following of your choice:
Great General, Great Merchant, Great Diplomat or Great Spy
+ Design a entire in game NPC sub-Faction with the developers (how the look, act etc.)
+ Design a research item with the developers.
+ 1 Extra Novus AEterno Infiltrator copy to give to a friend (8 keys in total!)

Consul General ==============================
Everything in the Lord Commander Tier and;

+ Join all the Taitale Development Team at a PAX convention! (we arrange for accommodation, the backer has to arrange his own transport). Talk to the developers about the game, it’s development and future plans (you will need to sign a NDA as we will talk about super secret stuff!).
+ 1 Extra Novus AEterno Infiltrator copy to give to a friend (9 keys in total!)

Intergalactic Consul General ==============================
Everything in the Consul General Tier and;

+ Exclusive homeworld Planet Earth, the only planet Earth in the universe!
+ A personal painting of you as avatar to be used in game and on the forum. Get a signed copy send home.
+ Fly over to the launch party (paid for by us, only within USA.)
+Talk to the developers about the game, its development and future plans.
+ 1 Extra Novus AEterno Infiltrator copy to give to a friend (10 keys in total!)
+ Taitale Studios will love you long time!
+ ULTIMATE LIFETIME PREMIUM ACCOUNT!! (You get everything Taitale ever makes and Cake. We will buy you a Cake...no lie, I promise!) To clarify that also includes a lifelong premium account and every single Ship and Skin and DLC we ever release for novus.)
